Destructor flew back to the base. He walked in and looked at his old ship. He 
would miss it. He dl the last of the computer data and flew off. He had not 
seen kit Kat but he sent a comm if she was in there.."Move Kit Kat..You got 
about 30 sec before the base goes up."
